Love the effects but it crashes about half the times i go to get a photo from my gallery. all seems to be fixed now!!

The crashes [shortly after tapping the 'DOWNLOADED' button] have stopped, but nothing shows up in the 'My Vimages' section of the app. I'll try creating more content to see if that issue has been fixed.

The colours completely change when you export the animation. Because of this, I tried emailing support to cancel my account before the 7 day trial expiry but several days later, still no reply. The app crashes as soon as I click on the upgrade panel, and then it fully disappears after that making the panel fully untraceable. Not sure if it's intentional to make more sales or a bug. I hope they refund me if they don't cancel my account before the expiry date. Would really appreciate a reply!
don't waste your time downloading this. would be a great app if it didn't crashed continuously. won't be going ahead after free trial for sure
app is constantly crashing. images not saving 😡😠😡😠😡😡😡😡😡

I bought the pro version and loved the app, however since the update it continually crashes, I have sent log files of crashes and even emailed the developer from the email address here in play store and have not even had the courtesy of a reply. Please get the app fixed ASAP please.
